node.materialandfinish: 1. Inner frame with pinewood & plywood. 2. Swivel chair mechanism on single seaters. 3. Base frame in stainless steel 304#. 4. Fully Upholstered in fabric. 5. Stainless steel in gold brushed finish.
node.dimension: 1. 3 seater 257cm x 106cm x 89cm with three cushions. 2. 2 seater 217cm x 106cm x 89cm with three cushions. 3. 1 seater 80cm x 89cm x 86cm with single cushion. 4. 1 seater 80cm x 89cm x 86cm with single cushion.
